content: **spiral heart facial scrubbie** this little stash buster is perfect for adding handmade and reusable sustainability to your self care routine they also make great gifts with your favorite soap or sugar scrub for a little something sweet the pattern requires basic knowledge of crochet and crochet stitches including chaining working in a magic_ring single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet increasing and working in the back and front loop this pattern is perfect for an adventurous beginner looking to test your skills by working in a spiral and through front and back loops only find the pattern on my website here https //homespunhues com/pattern/heart-facial-scrubbie/ 1 **finished measurements** finished scrubbie measures approximately 4 5 in diameter using a 5 0mm crochet hook and size 4 worsted weight yarn **materials** 28yds / 26m 16g of a durable size 4 worsted weight cotton yarn - i use lily sugar n cream 5 0mm crochet hook scissors tapestry needle stitch marker **pattern notes** pattern is written in american standard terms do not join between rounds scrubbie is worked in a spiral you may sell small batch handmade items using this pattern including a link with credit in your product description you may not redistribute or resell this pattern without written consent from the author contact me for pattern licensing information because this is a digital file and will be available instantly for download any refund or cancellation requests are unavailable **for more information** visit the pattern on my website at https //homespunhues com/pattern/heart-facial-scrubbie/ 2 **recommended use** use finger loop to secure scrubbie to your hand during use lather with your favorite soap for an exfoliating wash follow yarn manufacturer s instructions for washing 1 https //homespunhues com/pattern/heart-facial-scrubbie/ 2 https //homespunhues com/pattern/heart-facial-scrubbie/
